title: 2 afks in the first 6 minutes.....by the 15 minute mark, they're still not back.

replies.body: And yet, the community will tell you that being able to surrender at 10 minutes is a dumb idea....
I once ran up to the middle of the field as {{champion:32}} in ARAM... And then realized I had 4 afks.
Stop being so toxic OP. Having 2 afk's on your team is no reason to lose your cool.
i wasn't mad.  i was bored lol.  it's boring as fuck to play anything less than 5 players, regardless what team.
